text: Our paper "Anchoring Bias Affects Mental Models and User Reliance in Explainable AI Systems" was accepted to ACM IUI 2021 Conference as a full paper.
I am happy to announce that I was a recepient of the Outstanding Achievement Awards 2020 from the University of Florida, College of Engineering.
I am organizing the TRust and EXpertise in Visual Analytics (TREX) Workshop at IEEE VIS 2020.
I got three full papers accepted to AAAI HCOMP 2020.
I co-organized University of Florida affiliated Virtual CHI Presentation Day.
Our XAI work got published as a CHI 2020 Late-Breaking Work.
Our SplitStreams paper got accepted to IEEE Transactions of Visualization and Computer Graphics.
